name: ROBO BLASTER
description: Let's play a new twin stick shooter arcade game called ROBO BLASTER! BLAST ROBOTS before ROBOTS BLAST you. Use PLASMA to UPGRADE LASER FIRE and DESTROY ENEMIES. Score a MILLION POINTS and FACE the DREADED BOSS known as VEG HEAD. Can you beat Robo Blaster? Let's play ROBO BLASTER!
